name: Ganbatte! Love Prince in Space
description: The player steps into the shoes of a gay high school student who moves to Japan and meets four different guys: Hiroshi, Kanata, Zack, and Charce who all try to end up in a romantic relationship with you. Once the player dates each one of them, all five of you get sent to Space Camp but something goes wrong and the teens are suddenly put in a life or death scenario.....
